Replying to 
@APompliano
Bitcoin's miners aren't "network owners." The owners are people who control UTXOs. Miners are servants and exist only as service providers for people who own bitcoins.

The block reward and fee market exist as a carrot-on-a-stick to keep them motivated to do more for the network.
